directions: Place the cranberries, oranges, apples, pecans, and sugar in the bowl of a food processor. Process until all ingredients are evenly ground, 2-3 minutes. Pour mixture into a bowl, cover, and refrigerate at least 2 days before serving.
ingredients: 2 navel oranges - washed thoroughly, unpeeled, cut into quarters
1 cup white sugar, or to taste
title: Grandma's Cranberry Sauce
